docs.snippet: Two gunmen on a motorcycle killed a man as he drove near Tel Aviv's bustling beachfront on Saturday, in what Israeli police suspected was the latest in a wave of gangland murders and attacks....
docs.lead_paragraph: Two gunmen on a motorcycle killed a man as he drove near Tel Aviv's bustling beachfront on Saturday, in what Israeli police suspected was the latest in a wave of gangland murders and attacks.

headline.main: Man Gunned Down as Gangland Crime Wave Rocks Israel
headline.print_headline: Man Gunned Down as Gangland Crime Wave Rocks Israel

docs.snippet: “The International Exhibition of Sherlock Holmes” offers a re-creation of 221B Baker Street, and asks visitors to figure out a killing....
docs.lead_paragraph: “The International Exhibition of Sherlock Holmes” offers a re-creation of 221B Baker Street, and asks visitors to figure out a killing.
docs.abstract: Edward Rothstein reviews show The International Exhibition of Sherlock Holmes at Center of Science and Industry in Columbus, Ohio.

headline.seo: A Sherlock Holmes Exhibition Stops in Ohio
headline.main: A Murder to Solve, as Holmes Did
headline.print_headline: A Murder to Solve, as Holmes Did

docs.snippet: Venezuelan police fired teargas and turned water cannons on stone-throwing protesters on Saturday to stop them blocking a Caracas highway in a fourth day of sporadic unrest against President Nicolas Maduro's government....
docs.lead_paragraph: Venezuelan police fired teargas and turned water cannons on stone-throwing protesters on Saturday to stop them blocking a Caracas highway in a fourth day of sporadic unrest against President Nicolas Maduro's government.

headline.main: Venezuelan Students Fight Police,' Chavistas' Rally
headline.print_headline: Venezuelan Students Fight Police,' Chavistas' Rally
